languages.text: {n}Если заранее не знать, что ищешь, взгляд никогда не зацепится за фигуру этой женщины-{g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}сервитора{/g}. Импланты и общая механистичность движений, пустой взгляд — все на месте. Но...{/n}

{n}If you didn't know what to look for, it would be easy to overlook this {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitor{/g}, which may have once been a woman. The servitor's implants, the mechanical nature of its movements, the empty gaze — it's all there. But...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Если заранее не знать, что ищешь, взгляд никогда не зацепится за фигуру этой женщины-{g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}сервитора{/g}. Импланты и общая механистичность движений, пустой взгляд — все на месте. Но...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}If one doesn't know what to look for beforehand, it's easy to miss this figure which may have once been a woman. The Servitor's implants, the mechanical nature of its movements, the empty gaze — it's all there. But...{/n}

{n}If one doesn't know what to look for beforehand, it's easy to miss this figure which may have once been a woman. The Servitor's implants, the mechanical nature of its movements, the empty gaze — it's all there. But...{/n}

{n}If you didn't know what to look for, it would be easy to overlook this Servitor, which may have once been a woman. The Servitor's implants, the mechanical nature of its movements, the empty gaze — it's all there. But...{/n}

{n}If you didn't know what to look for, it would be easy to overlook this Servitor, which may have once been a woman. The Servitor's implants, the mechanical nature of its movements, the empty gaze — it's all there. But...{/n}

{n}If you didn't know what to look for, it would be easy to overlook this {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitor{/g}, which may have once been a woman. The servitor's implants, the mechanical nature of its movements, the empty gaze — it's all there. But...{/n}

languages.text: {n}如果你并不清楚要找什么，那你可能会很容易忽视这个{g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}机仆{/g}。这个机仆之前应该是个女人。它浑身上下插满了植入物，动作像机械一样生硬，目光空洞。这一切都似乎都无可挑剔，不过……{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}If you didn't know what to look for, it would be easy to overlook this {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitor{/g}, which may have once been a woman. The servitor's implants, the mechanical nature of its movements, the empty gaze — it's all there. But...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}如果你并不清楚要找什么，那你可能会很容易忽视这个{g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}奴工{/g}。这个奴工之前应该是个女人。它浑身上下插满了植入物，动作像机械一样生硬，目光空洞。这一切都似乎都无可挑剔，不过……{/n}

languages.text: {n}Si no supieras lo que estás buscando, sería fácil pasar por alto a este {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servidor{/g}, que puede que antaño fuera una mujer. Sus implantes, sus movimientos mecánicos, su mirada vacía... lo tiene todo. Pero...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}If you didn't know what to look for, it would be easy to overlook this {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitor{/g}, which may have once been a woman. The servitor's implants, the mechanical nature of its movements, the empty gaze — it's all there. But...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Si no supieras lo que estás buscando, sería fácil pasar por alto a este {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servidor{/g}, que puede que antaño fuera una mujer. Sus implantes, sus movimientos mecánicos, su mirada vacía... lo tiene todo. Pero...{/n}

languages.text: {n}探そうという明確な意志がなければ、この{g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}サーヴィター{/g}を見逃していたかもしれない。昔は女性だったらしい面影がある。インプラント、機械的な動き、うつろな目を、サーヴィターの特徴はすべて備わっているが…{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}If you didn't know what to look for, it would be easy to overlook this {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitor{/g}, which may have once been a woman. The servitor's implants, the mechanical nature of its movements, the empty gaze — it's all there. But...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}探そうという明確な意志がなければ、この{g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}サーヴィター{/g}を見逃していたかもしれない。昔は女性だったらしい面影がある。インプラント、機械的な動き、うつろな目を、サーヴィターの特徴はすべて備わっているが…{/n}

languages.text: {n}Wenn du nicht wüsstest, wonach du suchst, könnte man diesen {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}Servitor{/g}, der früher eine Frau gewesen sein könnte, leicht übersehen. Die Implantate, die mechanisch wirkenden Bewegungen, der leere Blick – alles da. Aber ...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}If you didn't know what to look for, it would be easy to overlook this {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitor{/g}, which may have once been a woman. The servitor's implants, the mechanical nature of its movements, the empty gaze — it's all there. But...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Wenn du nicht wüsstest, wonach du suchst, könnte man diesen {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}Servitor{/g}, der früher eine Frau gewesen sein könnte, leicht übersehen. Die Implantate, die mechanisch wirkenden Bewegungen, der leere Blick – alles da. Aber ...{/n}

languages.text: {n}Si vous ne saviez pas exactement quoi chercher, vous n'auriez pas fait attention à ce {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitor{/g}, qui semble avoir été une femme par le passé. Ses implants, ses mouvements mécaniques, son regard vide... tout y est. Mais...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}If you didn't know what to look for, it would be easy to overlook this {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitor{/g}, which may have once been a woman. The servitor's implants, the mechanical nature of its movements, the empty gaze — it's all there. But...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Si vous ne saviez pas exactement quoi chercher, vous n'auriez pas fait attention à ce {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitor{/g}, qui semble avoir été une femme par le passé. Ses implants, ses mouvements mécaniques, son regard vide... tout y est. Mais...{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ne aradığını bilmiyor olsan bir zamanlar kadın olduğunu düşündüğün bu {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}hizmetörü{/g} kolayca gözden kaçırabilirdin. Hizmetörlere has implantlar, hareketlerindeki mekanik mizaç, boş bakışlar... Hepsi tam ama...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}If you didn't know what to look for, it would be easy to overlook this {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitor{/g}, which may have once been a woman. The servitor's implants, the mechanical nature of its movements, the empty gaze — it's all there. But...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ne aradığını biliyor olmasan bir zamanlar kadın olduğunu düşündüğün {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}hizmetör{/g}ü kolayca gözden kaçırabilirdin. Hizmetörün implantları, hareketlerindeki mekanik mizaç, boş bakışlar... Hepsine sahip ama...{/n}
